text.section:
The Department shall use existing resources to establish a toll free Maryland Pharmacy Access Hotline that:
Operates during regular business hours; and
During nonbusiness hours allows callers to leave a message.

section.section: The Department shall distribute to all Program recipients information about the Maryland Pharmacy Access Hotline.

The information shall state clearly in easily readable print:
The toll free telephone number of the hotline; and
That the Program recipient should call the telephone number if the Program recipient is having problems getting necessary medicines.

text.section: The Department shall notify all health care providers who participate in the Program about the Maryland Pharmacy Access Hotline.

The Department shall:
Develop a methodology to track the number and type of calls received by the Maryland Pharmacy Access Hotline; and
Provide a quarterly report to the Pharmacy and Therapeutics Committee that summarizes the number and type of calls received by the Maryland Pharmacy Access Hotline.
